custom-sql.sql: SELECT SocialActivitySet.* FROM SocialActivitySet WHERE SocialActivitySet.activitySetId IN ( SELECT T1.lastModifiedId FROM ( SELECT SocialActivitySet.activitySetId as lastModifiedId , MAX(SocialActivitySet.modifiedDate) FROM SocialActivitySet WHERE SocialActivitySet.userId = ? AND SocialActivitySet.classNameId = ? GROUP BY SocialActivitySet.classPK) as T1) ORDER BY SocialActivitySet.modifiedDate DESC
